source.guidance:
False, JavaScript is an interpreted language.
True, as of ES6 semi-colons are not mandatory at the end of a line of code.
source.name: Fill in the Blank Example Question
source.text:
<<<False>>> JavaScript is a compiled language.
<<<True>>> You are no longer required to use a semi-colon at the end of a line.

text: You are no longer required to use a semi-colon at the end of a line.
